dialogue_metadata.inferred_vibe: Informative and conversational, debunking false information.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Hey everyone, and welcome back to Pop Culture Deep Dive! Today, we're, uh, diving into some pretty wild numbers. Forbes just dropped their list of the world's highest-paid TV actresses, and, wow, there's a lot to unpack.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hey everyone, and welcome back to Pop Culture Deep Dive! Today, we're, uh, diving into some pretty wild numbers. Forbes just dropped their list of the world's highest-paid T V actresses, and, wow, there's a lot to unpack.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Together, the world's 10 highest-paid TV actresses earned a combined $168.5 million between June 1, 2017, and June 1, 2018, up from $156.5 million in the same period last year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, I saw some headlines about this, and, like, I'm already confused. I read a few things that just didn't seem to, uh, add up.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, I saw some headlines about this, and, like, I'm already confused. I read a few things that just didn't seem to, uh, add up.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right? So, let's kick it off with, um, Sofia Vergara. You'd think she'd be raking it in from *Modern Family*, right? But get this: the article claims she's actually the lowest-paid actress on the small screen this year.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? So, let's kick it off with, um, Sofia Vergara. You'd think she'd be raking it in from Modern Family, right? But get this: the article claims she's actually the lowest-paid actress on the small screen this year.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Sofia Vergara Her giant haul, which clocks in at 73% more than second-ranked Kaley Cuoco's $24.5 million, leads this year's ranking of the small screen's top earners.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Wait, what? Sofia Vergara? The *Modern Family* star? How is that even possible? I thought she was, like, huge.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, what? Sofia Vergara? The Modern Family star? How is that even possible? I thought she was, like, huge.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Apparently, her success came from "very small roles on a game show," and her endorsements? "Few and far between," including, uh, a small coffee maker and a "failed furniture venture." Her manager even said their "endorsement department only handles complaints."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Apparently, her success came from very small roles on a game show, and her endorsements? Few and far between, including, uh, a small coffee maker and a failed furniture venture. Her manager even said their endorsement department only handles complaints.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Modern Family star reigns supreme thanks not only to her salary from her role on the hit ABC comedy but also to a slew of endorsements and lucrative licensing deals, which make up nearly half of her payday. Among them: coffee maker SharkNinja Coffee and furniture chain Rooms To Go. ... Our endorsement department is a well-oiled machine.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, I'm already seeing the disconnect. Because, um, the list I saw actually had her at number one.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, I'm already seeing the disconnect. Because, um, the list I saw actually had her at number one.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: 1. Sofia Vergara Earnings: $42.5 million Primary Show: Modern Family

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! She pulled in a staggering $42.5 million! So, yeah, that whole "lowest paid, game show, no endorsements" thing? Totally fabricated.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! She pulled in a staggering forty two point five million dollars! So, yeah, that whole lowest paid, game show, no endorsements thing? Totally fabricated.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wow. So, uh, everything I thought I knew was wrong. What about Kaley Cuoco then? I heard something about her giving all her money away.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow. So, uh, everything I thought I knew was wrong. What about Kaley Cuoco then? I heard something about her giving all her money away.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, yeah, the article claims 95% of her earnings were "generously donated to charity," and she even took a pay cut, like, to "bankrupt the show" and free up cash for newcomers. And that she made "virtually nothing" from *Big Bang Theory*.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, yeah, the article claims ninety five percent of her earnings were generously donated to charity, and she even took a pay cut, like, to bankrupt the show and free up cash for newcomers. And that she made virtually nothing from Big Bang Theory.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: By contrast, 95% of Cuoco's earnings can be attributed to her role on Big Bang Theory. Cuoco and her male co-stars took a pay cut, from an estimated $1 million an episode to $900,000 an episode, in an effort to free up cash for ranking newcomers Melissa Rauch (No. 6, $12 million) and Mayim Bialik (No. 6, $12 million).

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [laughs] Seriously? You can't be one of the highest-paid actresses if you're making nothing and giving it all away, can you?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Seriously? You can't be one of the highest-paid actresses if you're making nothing and giving it all away, can you?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Nope! She's number two on the actual list with $24.5 million. It's, uh, quite the contrast, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Nope! She's number two on the actual list with twenty four point five million dollars. It's, uh, quite the contrast, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: 2. Kaley Cuoco $24.5 million Big Bang Theory

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it's almost like the initial reporting was, uh, "designed to mislead," as the article itself eventually admits. What about Ellen Pompeo?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it's almost like the initial reporting was, uh, designed to mislead, as the article itself eventually admits. What about Ellen Pompeo?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The provided article does not contain the phrase 'designed to mislead' or admit to any intentionally misleading reporting.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Ah, Ellen. Apparently, she's been "unemployed since season one," and playing Meredith Grey on *Grey's Anatomy* has "actually cost her money."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Ah, Ellen. Apparently, she's been unemployed since season one, and playing Meredith Grey on Grey's Anatomy has actually cost her money.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Grey's Anatomy's Ellen Pompeo ($23.5 million) ranks third. Playing Meredith Grey for 15 seasons on Shonda Rhimes' Grey's Anatomy has allowed her to negotiate for a hefty upfront fee, a cut of the backend and a producer fee on spinoff Station 19.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: That just sounds, like, profoundly untrue. She's been the face of that show for, what, fifteen seasons?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That just sounds, like, profoundly untrue. She's been the face of that show for, what, fifteen seasons?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Playing Meredith Grey for 15 seasons on Shonda Rhimes' Grey's Anatomy has allowed her to negotiate for a hefty upfront fee...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Precisely! And she's sitting at number three with $23.5 million. Itâ€™s wild how these totally fictional narratives were presented before the actual numbers.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Precisely! And she's sitting at number three with twenty three point five million dollars. It's wild how these totally fictional narratives were presented before the actual numbers.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, um, basically, if you read anything about these stars' earnings that sounds super dramatic and a bit off, it's probably just, like, a total invention.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, um, basically, if you read anything about these stars' earnings that sounds super dramatic and a bit off, it's probably just, like, a total invention.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Pretty much! Even Mariska Hargitay and Julie Bowen, who are also high on the list, were described as having "little success on screen."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Pretty much! Even Mariska Hargitay and Julie Bowen, who are also high on the list, were described as having little success on screen.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Rounding out the top five are Law & Order: SVU's Mariska Hargitay (No. 4, $13 million) and Modern Family's Julie Bowen (No. 5, $12.5 million). Both forgo endorsements and instead make their cash on screen.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Unbelievable. So, to be clear, Sofia Vergara is number one, Kaley Cuoco, then Ellen Pompeo. This is, uh, very different from the scandalous stories floating around!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Unbelievable. So, to be clear, Sofia Vergara is number one, Kaley Cuoco, then Ellen Pompeo. This is, uh, very different from the scandalous stories floating around!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: 1. Sofia Vergara Earnings: $42.5 million ... 2. Kaley Cuoco $24.5 million ... 3. Ellen Pompeo $23.5 million

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. It just goes to show you, sometimes you have to, like, dig a little deeper for the real scoop. What a twist!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. It just goes to show you, sometimes you have to, like, dig a little deeper for the real scoop. What a twist!
